title: worldofcoins
author: worldofcoins
created_time: September 27, 2023, 10:24:31 PMLast edit: November 23, 2023, 09:03:29 PM by worldofcoins
content: /]Website"Nightmare Stresser is the most powerful IP booter on the market. 24/7 uptime the best Layer 4 & Layer 7 bypasses."[banned site]" seeks members to promote their service on the forum.Campaign Rules- A maximum of 25 posts/week will be paid.- No minimum posts /week- Posts made in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, Bounty Threads, Lending section, and where the signature is not displayed will not be counted.- Posts should be 100 characters minimum. Low-quality posts will not be counted.- Enrolling with Alt Account(s) is forbidden.- You cannot Enroll if you've valid negative (-ve) Tags/Flags against you by any DT-1, DT-2 Member(s).- A minimum of 5 Earned Merits in the past 120 days are required to participate in the campaign.- After acceptance (Avatar, Signature & Personal Text) must be worn within 24 hours.- Removing/Changing the signature while in the Campaign will result in disqualification, and you will have to re-apply if you want to join again.- I reserve the right to kick you out for any valid misconduct done by you and deny the payment.- Week will start on Friday and end on Thursday (Forum's time)- AI-generated content isn't valid and will not be paid. It will get you removed from the campaign.Pay rates for Ranks(2x) Full-Member Rank: 1$ /Post(2x) Senior: 1.5$ /Post(2x) Hero & Legendary Rank: 2$ /PostApplication formCode:Username:Profile-Link:Rank:BTC Address (Segwit):Post-Count:Merits Earned (Last 120 Days):Spreadsheet
